passive.name: Flowers and Butterflies
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>. While the wearer is in battle, for every {{2}} SPD that exceeds <unbreak>100</unbreak>, the DMG of the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill is increased by <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> and the CRIT DMG of their Ultimate is increased by <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong>. This effect can stack up to {{5}} time(s).
